name: Silenced
description:
The game uses the "ROGUE" mode of action. The enemy will not move until the player moves. You can stop at any time to think about the next course of action.
There aren't too many action game elements in the game, but think carefully where you want to go. After all, you're just a vulnerable ordinary person and don't suffer any harm.
Deep exploration, familiarity with the enemy's action characteristics, winning games, challenging difficult hiding areas, and touching friendly Orc companions
Adventure in a number of unique areas, go to the destroyed capital of the kingdom, defeat the tide of enemies, meet new partners, and discover the secrets of the Kingdom
Simple operation, no death penalty, automatic storage, clearance function, etc., but this is a puzzle game, no equipment skills and other attributes.
Move your brain (or press the Z button several times more). This game is suitable for people who can calm down and slowly play the game (just press the Z button up and down).


* This game has nothing to do with changed.
* This game is a full-age game.
